description:
A comfortable and modern apartment locate in Astoria. The little Manhattan. Famous neighborhood, surrounded by restaurants and bars.
Astoria park is one of the best parks in Nuove York with a beautiful view. Just 10 minutes from manhattan.
New building, with laundry, elevator. The building has a rooftop, terrace with a spectacular view of manhattan. A quiet building. The apartment is cozy, with balcony, spacious. Modern and elegant. A familiar place
name: Cozy and Modern apartment in Astoria
